INSERT INTO BUILD_SCORE_MONTH_AVG(BUILD_ID, SCORE, CALCULATION_TIME, DANGER_LEVEL)
SELECT BUILD_ID, SCORE, #{_parameter} as CALCULATION_TIME, CASE WHEN SCORE<=20 THEN '1' WHEN SCORE<=60 THEN '2' WHEN SCORE<=70 THEN '3' WHEN SCORE<=80 THEN '4' ELSE '5' END DANGER_LEVEL FROM (
SELECT BUILD_ID, AVG(SCORE) AS SCORE FROM "BUILD_SCORE_c1" WHERE SUBSTR(CALCULATION_TIME, 0, 7)=#{_parameter} GROUP BY BUILD_ID )
